Package elevatorManager

Class ElevatorManager

java.lang.Object
elevatorManager.ElevatorManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElevatorObserver
public class ElevatorManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ElevatorObserver
This component is responsible for handling all requests by the UserInteraction component. It has a queues for handling the requests by the UserInteraction component. Requests are handled while taking into consideration the priorities specified. This component is also responsible for handling emergencies.

  • Constructor Details

    • ElevatorManager

      private ElevatorManager()
      Private constructor of emergency manager. It initiates an empty array of floors, elevators, and sets mode to normal.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ElevatorManager getInstance()
      Returns:
      returns ElevatorManager singleton shared instance.

    • requestPickup

      public void requestPickup​(ElevatorManagerRequest request)
      Adds the pick up request passed to the queue to be handled.
      Parameters:
      request - ElevatorManagerRequest passed to be handled.

    • requestDestination

      public void requestDestination​(ElevatorManagerDestinationRequest request)
      Adds the destination request passed to the queue to be handled.
      Parameters:
      request - ElevatorManagerRequest passed to be handled.

    • handlePickUpRequest

      private boolean handlePickUpRequest()
      This method handles the top request in the priority queue. It checks if there are available elevators. If there is an elevator elevator, it is assigned to the task.
      Returns:
      true if an elevator is assigned to task, and false otherwise.

    • handleDestinationRequest

      private boolean handleDestinationRequest()
      This method handles the top destination request in the queue.
      Returns:
      true if an elevator is assigned to task, and false otherwise.

    • handleEmergency

      public void handleEmergency()
      This method handles the emergency properly. It stops all elevators at nearest floor, and returns them to the ground floor.

    • stopElevator

      public void stopElevator​(Elevator elevator)
      This method stops the passed elevator at the nearest floor.
      Parameters:
      elevator - Elevator passed to be stopped.

    • getNearestAvailableElevatorToFloor

      private Elevator getNearestAvailableElevatorToFloor​(int floorId)
      This method finds the nearest free elevator to the passed floor.
      Parameters:
      floorId - id of floor of interest
      Returns:
      Elevator that is the available and nearest to floorId

    • validateElevators

      private boolean validateElevators()
      Validates if there are elevators array is not empty.
      Returns:
      false if elevators array empty, true otherwise

    • validateFloors

      private boolean validateFloors​(int floorId)
      Validates if floors are not empty and if the passed floorId is within the floors listed.
      Parameters:
      floorId - floorId to be checked
      Returns:
      true if floorId is within the listed floors, false otherwise.
